title: Minimalist Solid Sleeveless Tank Top
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a minimalist solid-color sleeveless tank top, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and clean hems, no model, no mannequin, no human, no lifestyle scene
techpack: Sleeveless tank top in organic cotton jersey with modal blend for softness; crew neck with self-fabric binding; straight cut silhouette; hip length; double-stitched hems for durability; available in soft ivory, warm beige, and charcoal grey solid colors.
provenance: Designed based on combination of minimalist solid print and sleeveless/tank style from provided examples.
design_text:
Minimalist Solid Sleeveless Tank Top (SLV-MIN-001)
